name: Tales From The Arabian Nights
overview: A unique learning experience in reading comprehension. Your child will be enchanted with the captivating stories of the Arabian Nights. The game includes three stories with stunning animated graphics: Aladdin's Lamp The Ebony Horse Ali Baba Each story has its own vocabulary building. The main learning objectives are to enhance your children's Reading Comprehension, Creative Writing and Language Arts Skills. The game contains over 600 multiple choice and fill-in reading and vocabulary questions. Also included is a built-in word processor called TALE MAKER which enables your child to do creative writing, and a QUIZ MAKER authoring system to create their own questions and answers. For extra value, there is a graphic ARABIAN MATCH GAME for developing memory and concentration skills.
